active_incidents.title: Users having trouble creating a workflow in Workflow Builder

notes.body: Thank you for your continued patience. We've identified and resolved the issue with Workflow Builder. Please reload Slack using Command + Shift + R (Mac) or Ctrl + Shift + R (Windows/Linux), and let us know if you continue to run into issues.

We’re continuing our investigation with Workflow Builder at this time. To clarify, clicking “Next” when attempting to create a new workflow draws no response. Thank you for your continued patience, we'll continue to provide updates as more information becomes available.

We’ve identified an issue affecting some users where creating a workflow silently fails and prevents the workflow from being created. We’re investigating the issue and will let you know as soon as we learn more. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
